## rushProjects() function

List the projects of a Rush monorepo with bullet-points

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function rushProjects(options?: RushProjectsOptions): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [RushProjectsOptions](./markdown-magic-utils.rushprojectsoptions.md) | Optional configuration to load |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

A string containing the rush projects of the monorepo as a bullet-list
